metadata.title: CVE-2024-12801 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in SaxEventRecorder by QOS.CH logbackversion 0.1 to 1.3.14 and 1.4.0 to 1.5.12  on the Java platform, allows anattacker toforge requests by compromising logback configuration files in XML.The attacks involves the modification of DOCTYPE declaration in  XMLconfiguration files.

criterions.comment: logback package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
